verses.verse: And there went <WH3212> <WH8799> a man <WH376> of the house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> to wife a daughter <WH1323> of Levi <WH3878>.

And the woman <WH802> conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>: and when she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> him that he was a goodly <WH2896> child, she hid <WH6845> <WH8799> him three <WH7969> months <WH3391>.

And when she could <WH3201> <WH8804> not longer <WH5750> hide <WH6845> <WH8687> him, she took <WH3947> <WH8799> for him an ark <WH8392> of bulrushes <WH1573>, and daubed <WH2560> <WH8799> it with slime <WH2564> and with pitch <WH2203>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> the child <WH3206> therein; and she laid <WH7760> <WH8799> it in the flags <WH5488> by the river's <WH2975> brink <WH8193>.
And his sister <WH269> stood <WH3320> <WH8691> afar off <WH7350>, to wit <WH3045> <WH8800> what would be done <WH6213> <WH8735> to him.

And the daughter <WH1323> of Pharaoh <WH6547> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> to wash <WH7364> <WH8800> herself at the river <WH2975>; and her maidens <WH5291> walked <WH1980> <WH8802> along by the river's <WH2975> side <WH3027>; and when she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the ark <WH8392> among <WH8432> the flags <WH5488>, she sent <WH7971> <WH8799> her maid <WH519> to fetch <WH3947> <WH8799> it.

And when she had opened <WH6605> <WH8799> it, she saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the child <WH3206>: and, behold, the babe <WH5288> wept <WH1058> <WH8802>. And she had compassion <WH2550> <WH8799> on him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is one of the Hebrews <WH5680> ' children <WH3206>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> his sister <WH269> to Pharaoh's <WH6547> daughter <WH1323>, Shall I go <WH3212> <WH8799> and call <WH7121> <WH8804> to thee a nurse <WH3243> <WH8688> of the Hebrew <WH5680> women <WH802>, that she may nurse <WH3243> <WH8686> the child <WH3206> for thee?

And Pharaoh's <WH6547> daughter <WH1323> said <WH559> <WH8799> to her, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>. And the maid <WH5959> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and called <WH7121> <WH8799> the child's <WH3206> mother <WH517>.

And Pharaoh's <WH6547> daughter <WH1323> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Take <WH3212> this child <WH3206> away <WH3212> <WH8685>, and nurse <WH3243> <WH8685> it for me, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee thy wages <WH7939>. And the woman <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the child <WH3206>, and nursed <WH5134> <WH8686> it.

And the child <WH3206> grew <WH1431> <WH8799>, and she brought <WH935> <WH8686> him unto Pharaoh's <WH6547> daughter <WH1323>, and he became her son <WH1121>. And she called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Mosheh <WH4872>: and she said <WH559> <WH8799>, Because I drew <WH4871> <WH8804> him out of the water <WH4325>.

And it came to pass in those days <WH3117>, when Mosheh <WH4872> was grown <WH1431> <WH8799>, that he went out <WH3318> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799> on their burdens <WH5450>: and he spied <WH7200> <WH8799> an Egyptian <WH4713> <WH376> smiting <WH5221> <WH8688> an Hebrew <WH5680>, one of his brethren <WH251>.

And he looked <WH6437> <WH8799> this way <WH3541> and that way <WH3541>, and when he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that there was no man <WH376>, he slew <WH5221> <WH8686> the Egyptian <WH4713>, and hid <WH2934> <WH8799> him in the sand <WH2344>.

And when he went out <WH3318> <WH8799> the second <WH8145> day <WH3117>, behold, two <WH8147> men <WH582> of the Hebrews <WH5680> strove <WH5327> <WH8737> together: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> to him that did the wrong <WH7563>, Wherefore smitest <WH5221> <WH8686> thou thy fellow <WH7453> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who made <WH7760> <WH8804> thee <WH376> a prince <WH8269> and a judge <WH8199> <WH8802> over us? intendest <WH559> <WH8802> thou to kill <WH2026> <WH8800> me, as thou killedst <WH2026> <WH8804> the Egyptian <WH4713>? And Mosheh <WH4872> feared <WH3372> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Surely <WH403> this thing <WH1697> is known <WH3045> <WH8738>.

Now when Pharaoh <WH6547> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> this thing <WH1697>, he sought <WH1245> <WH8762> to slay <WH2026> <WH8800> Mosheh <WH4872>. But Mosheh <WH4872> fled <WH1272> <WH8799> from the face <WH6440> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Midian <WH4080>: and he sat down <WH3427> <WH8799> by a well <WH875>.

Now the Kohen <WH3548> of Midian <WH4080> had seven <WH7651> daughters <WH1323>: and they came <WH935> <WH8799> and drew <WH1802> <WH8799> water, and filled <WH4390> <WH8762> the troughs <WH7298> to water <WH8248> <WH8687> their father's <WH1> flock <WH6629>.

And the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> came <WH935> <WH8799> and drove them away <WH1644> <WH8762>: but Mosheh <WH4872> stood up <WH6965> <WH8799> and helped <WH3467> <WH8686> them, and watered <WH8248> <WH8686> their flock <WH6629>.
And when they came <WH935> <WH8799> to Reuel <WH7467> their father <WH1>, he said <WH559> <WH8799>, How <WH4069> is it that ye are come <WH935> <WH8800> so soon <WH4116> <WH8765> to day <WH3117> ?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, An Egyptian <WH4713> <WH376> delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> us out of the hand <WH3027> of the shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, and also drew <WH1802> <WH8804> water enough <WH1802> <WH8800> for us, and watered <WH8248> <WH8686> the flock <WH6629>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his daughters <WH1323>, And where is he? why is it that ye have left <WH5800> <WH8804> the man <WH376>? call <WH7121> <WH8798> him, that he may eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> was content <WH2974> <WH8686> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> with the man <WH376>: and he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872> TZipporah <WH6855> his daughter <WH1323>.

And she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him a son <WH1121>, and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Gershom <WH1647>: for he said <WH559> <WH8804>, I have been a stranger <WH1616> in a strange <WH5237> land <WH776>.

And it came to pass in process <WH1992> <WH7227> of time <WH3117>, that the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> died <WH4191> <WH8799>: and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> sighed <WH584> <WH8735> by reason of <WH4480> the bondage <WH5656>, and they cried <WH2199> <WH8799>, and their cry <WH7775> came up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH430> by reason of the bondage <WH5656>.

And 'Elohim <WH430> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> their groaning <WH5009>, and 'Elohim <WH430> remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> his covenant <WH1285> with Avraham <WH85>, with Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and with Ya`akov <WH3290>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> looked <WH7200> <WH8799> upon the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and 'Elohim <WH430> had respect <WH3045> <WH8799> unto them.
